title: Okupas
overview: Ricardo, an ex-student of medicine, is convinced by his premium to settle in a godforsaken house and to prevent from taking the same one. He invites to share his demurrage to his old friend of school, the "Chicken" to that there add Walter and the "Chiqui" two personages that he meets circunstancialmente. These three marginal ones that will offer to him new and irresistible experiences. This is the history of Ricardo's initiation in a world completely not known by him become infested with drugs, abuses and crimes.
